body: I'm planning a themed #moviemarathon night! What theme should I go with? #movies #movienight
question: Theme for movie night?

comments.body: Classic Sci-Fi all the way! You can’t go wrong with movies like *Blade Runner* or *2001: A Space Odyssey*. Perfect for an immersive night.
@23232 I’ve been meaning to rewatch *Blade Runner*! Sci-Fi could be a good choice to really dive into some thought-provoking stuff.
80s Action, no question! The energy, the one-liners, the explosions—it’s the perfect combination for a fun night. *Die Hard*, *Terminator*, *Predator*—can’t beat it!
@34343 Oh man, those are some legendary choices! *Die Hard* always gets me hyped. It’d be a wild night with that lineup!
I voted Romantic Comedies! They’re perfect for a lighthearted night, and you can never go wrong with something like *10 Things I Hate About You* or *When Harry Met Sally*.
@45454 A rom-com marathon could definitely be fun. I’d probably throw in *The Proposal* too—always a crowd-pleaser!
Horror Thrillers, 100%! If you want an intense night, this is the way to go. Imagine watching *The Shining* or *Get Out* in a dark room—it’ll keep everyone on the edge of their seat.
@56565 Horror definitely amps up the excitement! *The Shining* is a classic, and I’ve been meaning to rewatch *Get Out*—good call!
Honestly, all these sound great! But I’d go for 80s Action. You’ll have an epic night, especially if you add some cheesy snacks to the mix!
@67676 80s action plus cheesy snacks? Sounds like a winning combination to me. Might have to stock up on popcorn and nachos!
